first-ngtags-app.title: First ngtags App
first-ngtags-app.preview:

[Ngtags](http://ngtags.org) objective is to simplify the creation of [AngularJS](https://angularjs.org) apps. Instead of creating complex _directive_ and _routes_ structure definitions it allows to create them through an `html` like tags self explained and contained. â€¦
